Descriptions.Text: Throw Glaive deals {1}% increased damage for each enemy hit.
Immolation Aura increases your movement speed by {1}% and its duration is increased by {2}%.
Increases your chance to parry by {1}%.
Mastery: Demonic Presence now also causes your Arcane, Fire, Frost, Nature, and Shadow damage to be dealt as Chaos instead, and increases that damage by {1}%.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by {1}%.
Strike your primary target for {1} Chaos damage and all nearby enemies for {2} Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.
Strike all nearby enemies for {1} Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond {2} targets.
Reduces the cooldown of Blade Dance by {1} sec.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.
Infernal Strike gains an additional charge.
Eye Beam generates {1} Fury every second, and its damage and duration are increased by {2}%.
Consume Magic now affects all enemies within {1} yards of the target, and grants {2}% Leech for {3} sec.
Increases your chance to dodge by {1}% and reduces all damage taken by {2}% for {3} sec.
Throw Glaive ricochets to {1} additional target.
Demolish the spirit of all those around you, dealing {1} Fire damage to nearby enemies and extracting up to {2} Lesser Soul Fragments, drawing them to you for immediate consumption.
Every {1} sec, Fiery Brand spreads to one nearby enemy.
Fire damage increased by {1}%.
Immolation Aura generates an additional {1} Fury over {2} sec.

Demon Blades and Throw Glaive leave open wounds on your enemies, dealing {1} Chaos damage over {2} sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by {3}%.

May be applied to up to {4} targets.
You take {1}% reduced damage after Demon Spikes ends, fading by {2}% per second.
Increases the radius of your Sigils by {1} yards.
Your damage brands the target, increasing magic damage taken by {1}%.
Each enemy stunned by Chaos Nova has a {1}% chance to generate a Lesser Soul Fragment.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing {1} Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for {2} sec.
Slice your target for {1} Chaos damage. Chaos Strike has a {2}% chance to refund {3} Fury.
Blade Dance causes your next Chaos Strike within {1} sec to have a {2}-{3}% increased critical strike chance and will always refund Fury.
Throw Glaive now deals damage from a random school of magic, and increases the target's damage taken from the school by {1}% for {2} sec.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of Blade Dance and Eye Beam are immediately reset.
Immolation Aura damage increases the duration of your Fiery Brand by {1} sec.
You heal for {1}% of all Fire damage you deal.
Immolation Aura dispels all magical effects on you when cast.
Eye Beam summons an allied Vengeance Demon Hunter who casts Fel Devastation, dealing {1} Fire damage over {2} sec. Dealing damage heals you for up to {3} health.
Fel Devastation summons an allied Havoc Demon Hunter who casts Eye Beam, dealing {1} Chaos damage over {2} sec. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.
All Sigils are now placed at your location, and the duration of their effects is increased by {1} sec.
Consume {1} beneficial Magic effect removing it from the target.
The radius of Darkness is increased by {1} yds, and its duration by {2} sec.
The chance that Chaos Strike will refund {1} Fury is increased by {2}% of your critical strike chance.
Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil reduces the cooldown of your Sigils by {1} sec.
Blade Dance, Chaos Strike, and Glaive Tempest reduce the cooldown of Eye Beam by {1} sec.
The final slash of Blade Dance deals an additional {1}% damage.
When Fel Devastation finishes fully channeling, it refreshes {1}-{2}% of its cooldown and refunds {3}-{4} Fury.
Summons darkness around you in an {1} yd radius, granting friendly targets a {2}% chance to avoid all damage from an attack. Lasts {3} sec.
Demon Spikes also increases your Parry chance by {1}% for {2} sec.
Your auto attacks deal an additional {1} Shadow damage and generate {2}-{3} Fury.
Enemies deal {1}% reduced magic damage to you for {2} sec after being afflicted by one of your Sigils.
Surge with fel power, increasing your Armor by {1}, and your Parry chance by {2}%, for {3} sec.

Quickly attack for {1} Physical damage.

Generates {2} to {3} Fury.
Eye Beam causes you to enter demon form for {1} sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Fel Devastation causes you to enter demon form for {1} sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Chaos Strike has a chance to spawn a Lesser Soul Fragment. Consuming any Soul Fragment grants {1} Fury.

Transform to demon form, moving at {1}% increased speed for {2} sec, knocking down all enemies in your path and dealing {3} Physical damage.

During Demonic Trample you are unaffected by snares but cannot cast spells or use your normal attacks. Shares charges with Infernal Strike.
Your tattoos reduce all damage taken by {1}%.
Your tattoos reduce magic damage taken by {1}%.

Blur now reduces damage taken by an additional {1}%.

Additionally, you automatically trigger Blur with {2}% reduced cooldown and duration when you fall below {3}% health. This effect can only occur when Blur is not on cooldown.
Imprison's PvP duration is increased by {1} sec, and targets become immune to damage and healing while imprisoned.

Interrupts the enemy's spellcasting and locks them from that school of magic for {1} sec.|cFFFFFFFF

Generates {2} Fury on a successful interrupt.|r
Interrupts the enemy's spellcasting and locks them from that school of magic for {1} sec.{FFFFFFFF|}
Disrupt generates {1} Fury on a successful interrupt.
You are able to jump again while near the apex of your first jump.
Fiery Brand has {1} sec reduced cooldown and {2} additional charge.

Place a Kyrian Sigil at the target location that activates after {1} sec.

Detonates to deal {2} Arcane damage and shatter up to {3} Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond {4} targets.
The cooldown of Fel Rush is reduced by {1}%.
The cooldown of Infernal Strike is reduced by {1}%.
Slash all enemies in front of you for {1} Chaos damage, and increase the damage your Chaos Strike and Blade Dance deal to them by {2}% for {3} sec. Deals reduced damage beyond {4} targets.
Dealing damage increases your movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
Increases the duration of Sigil effects by {1} sec.
Increases the duration of Demon Spikes by {1} sec.

Blasts all enemies in front of you, dealing guaranteed critical strikes for up to {1} Chaos damage over {2} sec. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.

When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional {4}% for {5} sec.
Immolation Aura's initial burst has a chance to shatter Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies.
Soul Cleave heals you for an additional {1} over {2} sec.
Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces the remaining cooldown of Demon Spikes by {1} sec.
Unleash a torrent of Fel energy over {1} sec, inflicting {2} Chaos damage to all enemies within {3} yds. Deals reduced damage beyond {4} targets.
Fel Devastation damage also heals you for up to {1} health.
Unleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you for {1} Fire damage over {2} sec. Causing damage also heals you for up to {3} health.
Impales the target for {1} Chaos damage and stuns them for {2} sec.
You take {1}% reduced magic damage while Immolation Aura is active.
Rush forward, incinerating anything in your path for {1} Chaos damage.
Fel Rush increases your movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
Infernal Strike increases your movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
Increases duration of Immolation Aura and Sigil of Flame by {1} sec.
Brand an enemy with a demonic symbol, instantly dealing {1} Fire damage and {2} Fire damage over {3} sec. The enemy's damage done to you is reduced by {4}% for {5} sec.
Fiery Brand also increases Fire damage you deal to the target by {1}%.
Blade Dance deals {1} Chaos damage to the first target struck.
Metamorphosis grants {1}% Versatility and its cooldown is reduced by {2} sec.
Sigil of Flame generates {1} additional Fury per target hit.
Soul Cleave deals {1}% increased damage to your primary target.

Your damaging abilities have a chance to call forth a condemned demon for {1} sec. Throw Glaive deals lethal damage to the demon, which explodes on death, dealing {2} Shadow damage to nearby enemies and healing you for {3}% of your maximum health. The explosion deals reduced damage beyond {4} targets.

Rapidly slash your target for {1} Physical damage, and shatter {2} Lesser Soul Fragments from them.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Fury.}

Enemies struck by Sigil of Flame are afflicted with Frailty for {1} sec.

You heal for {2}% of all damage you deal to targets with Frailty.
When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional {1}% for {2} sec.
Throw Glaive now costs {1} Fury and throws a second glaive at the target.
Launch two demonic glaives in a whirlwind of energy, causing {1} Chaos damage over {2} sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.

Reduces your falling speed.

You can activate this ability with the jump key while falling.
Vengeful Retreat provides immunity to loss of control effects, and reduces damage taken by {1}% until you land.
Immolation Aura's damage increases by {1}% each time it deals damage.

You strangle the target with demonic magic, dangling them in place for {1} sec.

Use Illidan's Grasp again to toss the target to a location within {2} yards, stunning them and all nearby enemies for {3} sec and dealing {4} Shadow damage.
Reduces magic damage taken by {1}%.
Engulf yourself in flames, radiating {1} Fire damage over {2} sec.
Immolation Aura instantly causes {1} Fire damage to enemies within {2} yards.
Increases the duration of Immolation Aura by {1} sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Immolation Aura by {1} sec.

Engulf yourself in flames, instantly causing {1} Fire damage to enemies within {2} yards and radiating {3} Fire damage over {4} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {5} Fury.}

Engulf yourself in flames, instantly causing {1} Fire damage to enemies within {2} yards and radiating {3} Fire damage over {4} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {5} Fury over {6} sec.}
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for {1} sec. Damage will cancel the effect. Limit {2}.
Chaos Strike damage increased by {1}%.
Increases the range of Disrupt to {1} yards.
Fel Rush damage increased by {1}%.
Reduces the cooldown of Sigil of Misery by {1} sec.
Immolation Aura increases your armor by {1}% and causes melee attackers to suffer {2} Fire damage.
Leap through the air toward a targeted location, dealing {1} Fire damage to all enemies within {2} yards.

Damaging an enemy before they damage you increases your critical strike chance by {1}% for {2} sec.

Using Vengeful Retreat refreshes your potential to activate this effect on any enemies you are in combat with.
Entering demon form causes your next Chaos Strike to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal {1} Chaos damage to all nearby enemies.
Demon's Bite deals {1}% more damage and generates {2} to {3} additional Fury.
Increases your Mastery by {1}%.

Chaos Nova, Eye Beam, and Fel Rush gain bonuses when striking {1} target.

|T135795:24|t {ffffffff|Chaos Nova}:
Stun duration increased by {2} sec.

|T1305156:24|t {ffffffff|Eye Beam}:
Deals {3}% increased damage.

|T1247261:24|t {ffffffff|Fel Rush}:
Generates {4}-{5} Fury.
While Demon Spikes is active, melee attacks against you cause Physical damage equal to {1}% of the damage taken back to the attacker.
Gain critical strike damage equal to {1}% of your critical strike chance.

Sustaining fatal damage instead transforms you to Metamorphosis form.

This may occur once every {1} min.
Increases the duration of Darkness by {1} sec.
Eye Beam deals guaranteed critical strikes.
Spectral Sight lasts an additional {1} sec if disrupted by attacking or taking damage.
Throw Glaive has {1} charges, and snares all enemies hit by {2}% for {3} sec.
Increases your Chaos damage by {1}% and your movement speed by {2}%.

Increases Armor by {1}% of your Agility. Armor bonus is doubled while Demon Spikes is active.

Also increases your attack power by {2}%.
While transformed, Shear and Fracture generate {1} additional Fury.
While transformed, Shear and Fracture generate {1} additional Lesser Soul Fragment.

Transform to demon form for {1} sec, increasing current and maximum health by {2}% and Armor by {3}%. While transformed, Shear and Fracture generate one additional Lesser Soul Fragment and {4} additional Fury.

Leap into the air and land with explosive force, dealing {1} Chaos damage to enemies within {2} yds, and stunning them for {3} sec. Players are Dazed for {4} sec instead.

Upon landing, you are transformed into a hellish demon for {5} sec, greatly empowering your Chaos Strike and Blade Dance abilities and gaining {6}% Haste and {7}% Leech.
Reduce the cooldown of Infernal Strike by {1} sec.
You deal {1}% increased damage to enemies for {2} sec after Sigil of Misery's effect on them ends.
Fel Rush, The Hunt, and Vengeful Retreat increase your damage done by {1}% for {2} sec.
Blade Dance now reduces targets' healing received by {1}% for {2} sec.
Slip into the nether, increasing movement speed by {1}% and becoming immune to damage, but unable to attack. Lasts {2} sec.

Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces all damage you take by {1}% for {2} sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Reduces the cooldown of Throw Glaive by {1} sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Darkness by {1} sec.
All Sigils are now placed at your target's location, and the duration of their effects is increased by {1} sec.
Mastery increases your movement speed.
All Sigils activate {1} second faster, and their cooldowns are reduced by {2}%.

Each time Immolation Aura deals damage, {1}% of the damage dealt by up to {2} critical strikes is gathered as Ragefire.

When Immolation Aura expires you explode, dealing all stored Ragefire damage to nearby enemies.
You fly into the air out of harm's way. While floating, you gain access to Fel Lance allowing you to deal damage to enemies below.
Chaos Strike has a {1}% chance to trigger a second Chaos Strike.
The cooldown of The Hunt is reduced by {1} sec whenever an enemy is killed while afflicted by its damage over time effect.
Leaving demon form grants a charge of Fel Rush and increases the damage of your next Blade Dance by {1}%.
While Demon Spikes is active, melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take {1} Physical damage. Generates high threat.
When Fiery Brand expires on your primary target, you gain a shield that absorbs up {1} damage for {2} sec, based on your damage dealt to them while Fiery Brand was active.
Removes all harmful magical effects from yourself and all nearby allies within {1} yards, and sends them back to their original caster if possible.
Fel Devastation heals you for up to {1}% more, based on your missing health.
Fel Devastation heals for an additional {1}%, and {2}% of its healing is converted into an absorb shield for {3} sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by {1} sec.
Enemies hit by Throw Glaive take {1}% increased damage from Eye Beam.
The duration of your active demon form is extended by {1} sec per {2} Fury spent.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by {1}%.

Killing an enemy sometimes creates a Soul Fragment that is consumed when you approach it, healing you for {1}% of maximum health and generating {2} Fury.

If the Soul Fragment came from a Demon, you will deal {3}% increased damage for {4} sec.

Killing a target will sometimes shatter their soul, leaving a Soul Fragment behind for {1} sec.

The Soul Fragment will be consumed when you approach it, healing you for {2} health.

Consuming a Lesser Soul Fragment heals you for {3}% of all damage taken in the last {4} sec, minimum {5}% of maximum health.

Consuming a Demon's soul will grant you {6}% increased damage for {7} sec.

Shears an enemy for {1} Physical damage, and shatters a Lesser Soul Fragment from your target.

Generates {2} Fury.

Shear shatters the target's soul, leaving a Lesser Soul Fragment behind for {1} sec.

Consuming a Lesser Soul Fragment heals you for {2}% of all damage taken in the last {3} sec, minimum {4}% of maximum health.
Shear generates {1} additional Fury.
Reduces the cooldown of your Sigils by an additional {1}%.

Place a Sigil of Chains at the target location that activates after {1} sec.

All enemies affected by the sigil are pulled to its center and are snared, reducing movement speed by {2}% for {3} sec.

Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after {1} sec.

Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for {2} sec.

Place a Sigil of Silence at the target location that activates after {1} sec.

Silences all enemies affected by the sigil for {2} sec.

Shield yourself for {1} sec, absorbing {2} damage.

Consumes all Soul Fragments within {3} yds to add {4} to the shield per fragment.

Carve into the soul of your target, dealing {1} Fire damage and an additional {2} Fire damage over {3} sec.  Immediately shatters {4} Lesser Soul Fragments from the target and {5} additional Lesser Soul Fragment every {6} sec.

Viciously strike up to {1} enemies in front of you for {2} Physical damage and heal yourself for {3}.

Consumes up to {4} available Soul Fragments and heals you for an additional {5} for each Soul Fragment consumed.
Every {1} Soul Fragments you consume increases the damage of your next Soul Cleave or Spirit Bomb by {2}%.

Leech increased by {1}%.

Gain an additional {2}% Leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates {1} Lesser Soul Fragment.

Multiple applications of Frailty may overlap.

Soul Cleave applies Frailty to your primary target for {1} sec.
When consuming a Soul Fragment would heal you above full health it shields you instead, up to a maximum of {1}.
Throw Glaive causes targets to take an additional {1}% of damage dealt as Chaos over {2} sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Spectral Sight by {1} sec.

Allows you to see enemies and treasures through physical barriers, as well as enemies that are stealthed and invisible. Lasts {1} sec.

Attacking or taking damage disrupts the sight.

Consume up to {1} available Soul Fragments then explode, damaging nearby enemies for {2} Fire damage per fragment consumed, and afflicting them with Frailty for {3} sec, causing you to heal for {4}% of damage you deal to them. Deals reduced damage beyond {5} targets.
Fel Devastation damage increased by {1}%.
Consume Magic generates {1} Fury when a beneficial Magic effect is successfully removed from the target.
Vengeful Retreat has a {1} sec reduced cooldown and generates {2} Fury over {3} sec.

Charge to your target, striking them for {1} Nature damage, rooting them in place for {2} sec and inflicting {3} Nature damage over {4} sec to up to {5} enemies in your path. 

The pursuit invigorates your soul, healing you for {6}% of the damage you deal to your Hunt target for {7} sec.
Fel energy thickens your skin to demonic proportions, increasing your Stamina by {1}% and your Armor by {2}%.
Throw a demonic glaive at the target, dealing {1} Physical damage. The glaive can ricochet to an additional enemy within {2} yards. Generates high threat.
Throw a demonic glaive at the target, dealing {1} Physical damage. The glaive can ricochet to {2} additional enemies within {3} yards.
Taunts the target to attack you.

You focus the assault on this target, increasing their damage taken by {1}% for {2} sec.  Each unique player that attacks the target increases the damage taken by an additional {3}%, stacking up to {4} times.

Your melee attacks refresh the duration of Focused Assault.
The final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional {1} Chaos damage over {2} sec.
Activating Immolation Aura increases the damage of your next Fel Rush by {1}%. Lasts {2} sec.
Taking damage causes you to gain Fury based on the damage dealt.
Reduces the Fury cost of Chaos Nova by {1}% and its cooldown by {2}%.
Increase the damage over time effect of The Hunt by {1}%.
Increases maximum Fury by {1}.
Vengeful Retreat reduces the movement speed of all nearby enemies by {1}% for {2} sec.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take {1} Physical damage.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take {1} Physical damage and have their movement speed reduced by {2}% for {3} sec.

Frailty now also reduces all damage you take from afflicted targets by {1}%.

Enemies struck by Soul Cleave are afflicted with Frailty for {2} sec.

Immolation Aura generates {1}-{2} Fury when it deals critical damage.

This effect may only occur once per {3} sec.
Frailty now also increases all damage you deal to afflicted targets by {1}%.
Increases maximum health by {1}%.
